A day out to remember.

A day out to remember.

Client:
Day Out With The Kids

Work:
Strategy / Visual Identity / UX Design / Digital / Film

Day Out With The Kids is a leading platform for finding family adventure, whatever the weather, wherever you are in the country. With a strong base of 17million users, Halo were appointed to re-imagine the brand, shaping it's proposition , developing the digital experience to ignite growth and expand market share in the UK.

Request a case study

Donec lobortis risus eu orci dignissim dictum. Proin tincidunt, justo eget luctus porttitor, nisl ante dignissim tellus, id porttitor turpis tortor vitae velit.

Halo have re-imagined our brand and completely transformed our UX, delivering bold strides in our offer and significant growth in our users. They really get us, our audience and the opportunity for the brand
Tony Seaman, UK Brand Manager

The dynamic visual identity allows for multiple marques to be experienced alongside strong and consistent typography. The logo is always as fresh and relevant as the site search results. Vibrant pastel tones give an approachable, friendly feel without loss of impact and the accompanying art direction is family focused. Creating a brand with fun, connection and togetherness at its core.

Introduction of digital
ticketing technology

Community building

Creation of contributor
& influencer network

User-centric platform

With a focus on mobile-up, Halo developed an intuitive search and discover approach that seamlessly connects families to exciting days out and adventures of every shape and size, prioritising location and relevance. Clear sign-posting navigation and advanced filtering return timely and personalised results.

We also developed a detailed - and ambitious - content strategy to help grow a loyal community of influencers and contributors, creating greater value for every user engagement.
